solution_line_template: First find the cooked volume of the spinach: {raw_spinach_volume} ounces * {volume_reduction_percent}% = <<{raw_spinach_volume}*{volume_reduction_percent}*{percent_factor}={cooked_spinach_volume}>>{cooked_spinach_volume} ounces

Then add that to the volume of the other ingredients to find the total volume: {cooked_spinach_volume} ounces + {cream_cheese_volume} ounces + {eggs_volume} ounces = <<{cooked_spinach_volume}+{cream_cheese_volume}+{eggs_volume}={total_volume}>>{total_volume} ounces
